scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && npm run api:dev" "cd site && npm run next:dev"
scripts.build: npx concurrently "cd server && npm run api:build" && npx concurrently -ks first "sleep 3 && cd site && npm run next:build" "cd server && npm run api:start"
scripts.install-all: npm i && npx concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd site && npm i"
